kDesc

A lasting image in cinema history; during the final epic fight The Terminator becomes damaged revealing the Endoskeleton underneath. A truly remarkable full body outfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Une image culte du cinéma : lors de l'ultime combat, le Terminator, abîmé, laisse apparaître son endosquelette. Un costume intégral d'endosquelette remarquable. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Ein bleibendes Bild in der Kinogeschichte: Während des epischen Endkampfs wird der Terminator beschädigt und sein Endoskelett ist zu sehen. Ein wahrhaft erstaunliches Ganzkörperoutfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Una delle immagini più famose nella storia del cinema: durante l'epica battaglia finale, Terminator viene danneggiato e rivela il suo endoscheletro. Un completo veramente fantastico. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Una última imagen para la historia del cine: durante la épica batalla final, el Terminator se ve dañado y aparece revelando el endoesqueleto interior. Un atuendo de cuerpo entero realmente extraordinario. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

最後の決戦で破損したターミネーターがあらわする顔面の金属骨格。映画史上永久の名場面を残しました。\n\nTerminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

영화 역사에 길이 남을 이미지. 최후의 싸움 끝에 터미네이터는 일부 파괴되어 속에 있는 엔도스켈리톤이 드러나게 됩니다. 정말 놀라운 전신 복장입니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

A lasting image in cinema history; during the final epic fight The Terminator becomes damaged revealing the Endoskeleton underneath. A truly remarkable full body outfit. 電影史上經久不衰的形象；在最後一次大戰中，終結者受損，顯露出了下層的內骨骼。這是一套真正引人注目的全身套裝。 Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
